content.raw: I think is the same problem described in issue #9. Note that `Docker`could be a little tricky in these situations because it will cache the command where you clone the VMRC repo, so it won’t be cloned again after merging the potential patch. I suggest to remove all lines after line 52, and clone and compile the workspace manually, to make sure that it fixes the issue. Then, you can restore the lines and rebuild.
content.html: I think is the same problem described in issue #9. Note that Dockercould be a little tricky in these situations because it will cache the command where you clone the VMRC repo, so it won’t be cloned again after merging the potential patch. I suggest to remove all lines after line 52, and clone and compile the workspace manually, to make sure that it fixes the issue. Then, you can restore the lines and rebuild.
